name: The Amazing Shrinking Giraffe
description:
You are Ginger, an everyday talking giraffe has been chosen to save the Universe. You have been given powers are to change size from the size of the Universe to the size of an atom. You are now "The Amazing Shrinking Giraffe".

Explore space in your spaceship, drive around on planets, and collect alien creatures and plants.

Ride on the back of giant dune worms. Or shrink down and ride on the back of beetles.

Grow to the size of a planet and jump between asteroids.

(The game is still evolving so may first be out in Early Access).
